title: Holiday Hub
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[div class="peppo-toc"]]
[[collapsible show="‚ñ∫ Table of Contents" hide="‚ñ≤ Table of Contents"]]
[[toc]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/div]]

@@@@

Celebrate the season in anomalous fashion with these holiday articles!

Holidays and articles are listed in alphanumeric order. Pages from international branches will be marked by a globe üåê emoji.

Honorable Mentions are for articles that do not explicitly reference the holiday in question, but evoke strong feelings of the holiday and would benefit readers seeking to enjoy that holiday's mood.

To add entries to this Hub, please see the How To Contribute guide at the bottom of the page.
@@@@
@@@@
[[module CSS]]
table { width: 100%; }

td { height: 1.5rem; }

#toc-action-bar,#toc .title { visibility:hidden; height: 0;}

.collapsible-block-link {
    text-align: center;
    display: block;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: large;
}

.peppo-toc {
    position:relative;
    z-index:01;
    background: #dfdfdf;
    padding: 5px;
    float:right;
    width: 30%;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
     .peppo-toc {
        float:none;
        width: 100%;
    }
}
[[/module]]

~~~~

+ How to contribute
[[collapsible show="‚ñ∂ Show guide" hide="‚ñ≤ Hide Guide"]]
This article is an open collaboration available to all users.[[footnote]]Unless otherwise exempted per prior disciplinary notices, as is standard.[[/footnote]] Please refrain from adding articles that mention a holiday in passing but do not otherwise meet any one of the following criteria:

* The article takes place on the holiday.
* The holiday plays a significant role in the article overall.
* The article strongly evokes the mood or atmosphere of the holiday.

For articles that do not mention a holiday explicitly but fit the holiday's mood/theme, please add under Honorable Mentions.

To add entries, use the following format:

[[code]]
|| [[[article-URL|Article Name]]] || [[*user Username]] ||
[[/code]]

Only add a Holiday or tab if entries exist for it (i.e. no blank tabs). Tab order goes SCP > Tale > GOI Format > Hub > Honorable Mentions.

INT articles may be listed next to regular entries in their respective categories, but please mark them with the globe üåê emoji at the end of the title to denote an outgoing link. If the article is in a language other than English and it has not yet been translated, please note the language as well.

To list multiple authors for a collaborative piece, add a space, underscore, and line break after the first author. Do this for the next author for every additional author you add. For example:

[[tabview]]
[[tab Two authors]]
[[code]]
|| [[[article-URL|Article Name]]] || [[*user FirstAuthor]] _
[[*user SecondAuthor]] ||
[[/code]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Three authors]]
[[code]]
|| [[[article-URL|Article Name]]] || [[*user FirstAuthor]] _
[[*user SecondAuthor]] _
[[*user ThirdAuthor]] ||
[[/code]]
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
[[/collapsible]]
